attributes.action: Leave the EU without a deal.
attributes.additional_details: Use this Petition to ask the government to understand that if the departure from the EU is not delivered, we will look at all legal means to remove parliament as the establishment entrusted to do the will of the people.
attributes.background: We have watched for too long the parliament we want to run our country effectively do exactly the opposite, the laziness of our politicians and their personal needs to go against the vote of the people.
